'''0.9833''' is a version of {{El|MinecraftEdu}}, released on October 19, 2012, which adds new features. It is based on [[Java Edition 1.2.5]].

== Additions ==
* Added PVP button in general menu{{verify}}
* New COOL tooltips for all setting buttons in client{{verify}}
* All general & assignment information is now also saved with map{{verify}}
